column1: I am 88 YEARS OLD AND PEOPLE CAN NOT BELIEVE MY SKIN, THEY ALLWANT TO KNOW WHAT I USE. I AM VERY HAPPY WITH YOUR PRODUCT.
Cleared up my acne in just a matter of two months. I tried different things but this worked miraculously

It is not about the product. C clarifying serum 10%. Vit C, and c clarifying serum vit 10% vit c and 4% hydroquinone pictures showed under add. I wanted to buy the one with hydroquinone, received the one without. :(
